head.heading: Book spaces and equipment
head.text: Via Varaamo you can book public premises or equipment for temporary or regular use.

infoRecurring.heading: Seasonal booking
infoRecurring.text: Apply for spaces or equipment for seasonal use. You can browse spaces before the application round starts.

footer.heading: About Varaamo
footer.body:
Varaamo is an online service run by the City of Helsinki, where you can reserve spaces and workstations for your use.

The re-designed booking service is in a pilot phase. New features and functionalities are being gradually introduced.

purposesHeading: What would you like to do?
unitsHeading: Where do you want to book the space or equipment?
